sentence.idiomatic: If you want to succeed in starting a business, the most crucial point is finding good projects.
The key to attracting foreign capital lies in market potential.
Is memorizing more vocabulary the key to learning English?
Eating more honey can promote better resistance to disease.
Nowadays, many companies have adopted the use of service to improve competitive strength.
Regardless of whether it's study or work, both can improve one's self-worth.
He often goes into the community, to listen closely to the aspirations of the average citizens.
He is a very attentive listener. Every time I am in a bad mood, he will always patiently listen to my complaints.
Mastering the ability to listen carefully to others opinions and viewpoints will be of great help in your work.
From the time I was little my parents already had very high hopes for me.
The higher one's expectations, the bigger the disappointment. Therefore, it would be best for you not to set your expectations too high.
This is my first job, so my salary expectations aren't very high. As long as I can learn things, then that's fine.
A life without introspection has no value.
As a public personage, he is constantly examining what he says and does to ensure its propriety.
During my time off at home, I thought deeply about my past and came to a lot of realizations about myself and my future.
I still have a lot of shortcomings. I will keep on making an effort.
As soon as she discovers she has any shortcomings, she promptly corrects them.
Every kind of product has its own merits and shortcomings. The key is to look at what functions you require.
I've recently encountered an obstacle to my personal development. It's really a headache.
The problem we need to solve right now is how to break the bottleneck.
He hasn't written anything good lately. Could it be that he has writer's block?
On Valentine's Day I want to give her a unique gift.
I want to choose a unique name, one that no one has used before.
You hold a unique place in my heart. No one can take the place of you.
Only if you unceasingly pursue him will you have a chance to overtake him.
Actually, I have a lot of pressure. I'm being chased by a ton of newcomers. If I don't work hard I won't make it.
You should chase after the people more capable than you, not ridicule those worse than you.
A lot of people ask me, what can I do to succeed?
Does it depend on wisdom, on hard work, or on luck?
What I want to tell everyone here is that the key to success is continual self improvement!
There is no ``best," there is only ``better."
Never be satisfied. Be seeking a better you at every moment.
If you want to improve yourself, you first need to know yourself.
The most important connection in your life is your connection to yourself.
You have to know your needs, to listen carefully to that inner voice, and to have even higher expectations for oneself.
You also have to actively examine yourself, determine your shortcomings, and then confidently say, ``I can do better!"
Choose a goal, and then stick to it.
This is a decisive step, because it will change everything.
When you do this, I will tell you loudly, ``you are a winner in life!"
When you are faced with obstacles and feel the next step is extremely difficult, you have to remember: although the world is brutal, your spirit is even tougher!
There's no road too long to walk, no mountain a man can't conquer.
Believe in yourself, and you will surely overcome adversity.
Why do you need to believe in yourself?
Because you are unique!
And why are you unique?
Because you have skills and qualities that other people don't!
So, you have the right to believe in yourself.
Please relax and go courageously!
Ascend to the height of your ability!
Followers are behind you, but when you believe in yourself and continually improve yourself, you will forever be running ahead of other people!
Finally, I want to tell you: ``I believe in you 100 percent. You can become a better you!"

word.literal: ascend to new heights and reach farther
